noun.description: A cat-sized American mammal of the weasel family, with distinctive black-and-white-striped fur. When threatened it squirts a fine spray of foul-smelling irritant liquid from its anal glands toward its attacker.

verb.description: Defeat (someone) overwhelmingly in a game or contest, especially by preventing them from scoring at all.
Fail to pay (a bill or creditor).

origin: Mid 17th century: from Abnaki segankw; variants occur in many other North American Indian dialects.
